Kyosho K03192B Mazda Savanna RX-3 1972 Fuji Masters 250km 19th Place T. Takechi

Purchased: 2014

From the same race as the #29 car above. After running near the front of field Takechi was sideswiped early in the race and ultimately finished 7 laps down.
